Blog.post: yup yup so Johnny and his cousin are trash talkin on ESPN NFL 2K5 on Xbox Live lol and people are gettin all steamed... of course... his cousin is a really good trash talker by the way.. lol its hilarious watching johnny beat someone 7-77 other than that Ive got that other part of No More, No Less by Collective Soul down.. now just for the last part... which shouldnt take too long.. and plus... my fingers hurt...

mmmhmm so Im over my dad's and Johnny's cousins are here and he's playing football with one of them.... lol he's constantly barraging him in the game because he is so "bad" lol its quite amusing... I rented Rallysport Challenge 2 and hope to play it online and whup the crap out of some people on there.. which I know I will so.. hmm.. not much more.. I installed two monitors... I don't know if they will keep them here buut it was worth the try and challenged my expertise lol cause I had many problems with the original monitor on the GeForce 4 MX440

Oh god please dont let him get voted into office... if he does.. i'll have to ruin him myself. I absolutely do not like John Kerry.. his whole Vietnam thing is rediculous... and all of his other things. And btw... he's ugly.. lol

lol welll I think I might be running out of ideas but at least you people have a better idea at whom is in Megatokyo... aaand we're probably going out somewhere tomorrow like we always do lol at least its something OO OO and btw I have a babysitting job.. lol that sounds soo stupid.. but Its only two days a week and i get paid 50$ a day soo lol the money is soon to be rolling in urlLink urlLink

well.. I didn't post a new picture before I left for me dad's... and that program is already successfully installed hehehe let the observation begin aaand well I installed Picasa and Hello over here so expect at least some pics to come on through over here

well I didnt make it... i went to sleep around 7AM but oh well.. now I wont be dead tired later hehe not a bad plan eh? Yeah so I'm goin' over my dad's in a short while aaand I'm gonna put that thing on his computer... aaand my computer is finally facing the Direction it should be... instead of to the right its facing forward... with the case door finally back on.. lol its been quite a while since I had it like this. The LAN party in Philly is comin' up soon.. and I can't wait... not only do I get to play lots of games with other people... but I also get to see Jen again.. which has been over 6 months since I did... and I do miss her lol but you know.. and I might be staying over her house for the two nights... which is what I wanna do... while my brother and maybe Joe go over to Alex's house.. lol ohh well.. hehe I'm hungry and I'm waiting for my dear ol' dad to get here to pick us up... and I'll also bring my Bass Guitar with me so I can learn something new. Well that's about all... I might post a new picture before I go.. so yeah seeya

Ooooo I can't help but post this photo on here.. it happens to almost be my absolute fav. of Megatokyo lol I think I'll have to try to draw this one first.. so.. when I do I'll post my version and I want opinions people! urlLink urlLink

hehe well I made it till 7 AM so far.. I tried that ZoneAlarm Firewall.. and... it sucks for me... it stopped Trillian... and didnt work with WindowFX and when something doesnt work with a Stardock product... its gone..lol aaaand well I'm alll back to normal hehe and uhmm.. I think I'll post another wonderful Megatokyo drawing (that I DIDNT do) lol because i havent even begun working on fixing the one drawing that I scanned in so far.. so yeah.. hehe

Ahhh well its almost four AM and I think that tonight I actually might stay up all night.. I'll only need a Boost in the morning.. which means I'll need to go out for Red Bull.. lol.. and now Im gonna post one of the screenshots I took of UT2004 which is a nice one since it is a Japanese themed map... aaand its either this or I go around town looking for pics to take.. which is hard when you live where I do.. aaaand now Im listening to Save Yourself - Johnny Lang which is a great song.. and yes.. im still looking over the Megatokyo webcomics over and over.. lol I cant help myself... hehe well anyway... here ya go! Oh oh and btw... I'd like to ask whomever does visit here leave a comment on this post reguarding if I should put up a profile pic or not...I had one up for a while.... and I dont know why I took it off but.. comments on that please urlLink urlLink

well.. with that statement out of the way... I now have to begin working on merging my recent scan of my biggest drawing so far... which I will put off doing.. I know it.. but anyway.. sorry for any possible confusion... I just really like Megatokyo... lol.. so.. well.. I also wish I has some REAL space to work on my drawings..... so I can really draw megatokyo... yeah... aaand well.. just wait and we'll all see hehe

lol lol lol i think we might have a small misunderstanding with these Megatokyo posts I have been putting up..... these are not... my drawings... lol... I do draw.. and plan to post one of them up here soon... but... once again you'll see my drawings when they come up... lol... also.... I am planning on creating my own drawings of Megatokyo considering how much I like the characters on the webcomic... so.. just wait for my real drawings... and..... i really do wanna draw some megatokyo.. and I think I'll be able to do it really well my others have been good so far.. you'll see a couple sometime soon.. the first one will be up as soon as I am able to put together the huge scan I made just now...
and here is the other one.. Both of them are cute so its all good... and the Indy Car in the back helps make this picture one of the best........ cant help meself urlLink urlLink

yes yes i know I might be obsessed a little with Megatokyo.. but these next two pics show a couple big passions in my life... Girls, Games, Cars.... lol It might be a tad odd but still.. hehe cant help myself..... and the gamer girl is cute... so...lol urlLink urlLink

ehehe well almost the weekend.. got a new version of the program... aaand im gonna install it myself. so i dont have much to worry about.. as long as it will start back up with other users and such... other than that Im quite bored.. and im still looking over megatokyo.. and I dont know why... well.. my brother is in his room playing Halo PC... I'll be posting a new pic soon soo look out for it!

met new person on the internet.. and he's more like me than i thought he would be... now that I got that out of the way.. i can talk more about Megatokyo and the whole love story thing in it and I cant wait till this weekend! im gonna be able to spy on people with my Keylogger! mostly seeing if Johnny will go on porn sites which should be very interesting hehehehe BLACKMAIL! well anyways.. im gonna post another one of me fav Megatokyo drawings.. and btw.. the main character Piro is a character like me.. Largo is like my brother and there is another character who is like my friend joe.. im gonna post a pic with Piro and Largo in it so.. here you go! (btw Piro is the guy on the left and Largo is the guy on the right) urlLink urlLink

Im bored.. kinda lonely... and its starting to make me feel as if Im never gonna get a g/f again.. though I know I will.. id just like to have one during the summer.... so I can love someone when I have all the time in the world to. That girl down there is currently starting to get involved with someone.. everyone else I know has a b/f or g/f... Im like the only one left.. and it sucks! damnit....

yup here we are.. im sorta bored.. i still cant stop thinking about Megatokyo and some of the females who happen to live around here... its kinda lonely buuut Im quite ok hehe well.. ive got myself a keylogger installed and im gonna go put one on my dad's computer over the weekend to see if Johnny is a porn fanatic lol wish me luck!

now dont get me wrong.. Im not into this stuff... but as stated previously... its for a sweet chick I know... www.yaoishrine.com (i know you probably already know about this one.. but.. i'll add more to this post when I find some others)

late late late at night.. just got done watching Something's Gotta Give... and during it I had an interesting conversation... not gonna tell with whom or what about... but... ahh i dont know what to think of love anymore.... I soo wish I could be going out with the Girl below... but... i guess im not special enough... or something.... eh.. well.. now i gotta look around for some Yaoi for some sweet chick I know...

and here is my favorite character.. i cant really figure out why... she's sort of mysterious... powerful... and she is straight forward...she's a gamer... she's also cute... and wears real cute clothes...lol (new addition to this post)... and she helps out the main character in his love woes..ahhhh i think i need someone like that.... urlLink urlLink

Well.... I recently (recently as in the last 3 hrs) read all of the Megatokyo webcomic leading up to the last strip published.... and i feel like a little girl of some sort... the love twists in that comic felt odd.. my stomach in knots and everything.... *sigh* just makes me wish I had someone to love and be loved by... so bad.. right now.. *sigh*... well.. what can I do about it? No one seems to like me that way.... sometimes it just makes me feel all lonely... Why Can't I Find Someone To Love?

well.. its official.. I love Google... and the little Hello program is awesome.. as well as Picasa.. but I've been using that for a while.. soo... lol.. and i figured since this is the only background I have made so far i might as well post it here as well as everywhere else.. lol.. even though i dont want the post below to go away from the main page........ but ohhh well... hehe urlLink urlLink
ahhh my big crush.. i figured i might as well let some people see her.. *siiigh* ahh my heart beats like crazy whenever i see her... urlLink urlLink

heheheh yes.. Im going to a LAN party tomorrow night... me old g/f is gonna be there.. aaand its gonna be really fun... Jopey cant go.. which really sucks... but.. at least my brother is going.. so that means Im going to be playing better games than I was at the LAN party before... hehe... I should go and train up a little... in CS MOHAA and UT2004... but.. I might not.. lol because I wont get around to doing it.. I think they might like the way I have my computer set up right now... so I might be giving them some files over the network... hehe with my ObjectDock down at the bottom of my screen.. and my Windowblinds theme set on DogmaX Ive got a pretty smooth theme going...especially with the Mahoro In a Wet Kimono background... (no you can't see anything) hehe yeah so... I really can't wait till tomorrow at like 5PM.. cause that's when I think we're heading out of this dump..

yes yes... so now that Ive become members of many new websites (including www.elitebastards.com, www.rage3d.com, www.wincustomize.org, and www.gaiaonline.com) ive noticed I have less and less time to update on everything else... Oh well Im still here hehe yeah.. so i'll post again later

here we go..another one hehe this is my brothers Doom 3 rendition of the Democratic National Convention hehe he was gonna put one balloon in there.. but.. you know.. laziness controls all urlLink urlLink
lol lol here we go.. one of the best Pictures on here so far.. made by my brother.. i couldnt help but post it on here hehehe urlLink urlLink

Yeah so here it is.. its the cover of his #3 comic release in stores.. and on www.megagear.com which I hope to soon purchase some books, shirts, sketchbooks, and Flapdoozies (yes, Flapdoozies) so yeah.. there you have it.. btw.. those two are Ping and Miho just incase you havent read it.. or dont know their names.. lol yeah so.. off to bed! And wish me luck on getting my computer's performance back to the optimal speeds it was at before! hehe not to sound too stupid :-P urlLink urlLink

Well well.. after some more "tweaking" with Doom 3.. I have found that it actually runs SLOWER now.. with the new "tweaks" from the EB forums... and Humus.. what Ive decided to do.. is go back to the way things were.. without the Rage3D tweaker and without the new "tweaks" for Doom 3... hopefully that will restore system performance and Doom 3 performance.. also.. I had found a way before to take off the 30FPS cap on Doom 3.. but with the new tweaks that were in there... it has seemed to re-enable the 30FPS cap... which I hate.. well.. maybe it'll go back after this reboot and everything is back to normal... btw.. Norton Systemworks is giving me a little trouble.. by refusing to start up and keep Norton Antivirus ccApp open.. (the Antivirus monitoring program) and it just found about 230 problems with Windows.. so maybe that might help with my problems as well... aaand its about 5:15AM and I'm tired.. so I think I'll go to bed after this.. and I'll have to take a shower tomorrow as well.. because.. well.. I have to with all of this hair lol I feel like I have more hair than Frankie (my pug) ahhh I hope all will be well after this restart I do.. maybe it will.. maybe it won't.... we'll find out! hehe.. well.. I will.. but anyway.. I have to post another Megatokyo pic before I go to bed.. so look out above for it in a couple mins..

mhmm this is wierd.. I like my computer tons more now then before the Reboot... this is really wierd.. lol Ive got everything perfectly configured.. working.. and everything its allll really good hehehehe listening to some Third Eye Blind on iTunes and on my Fav. Headphones.. hehe my Bose Triport Headphones.. my brother is in his room playing Doom 3 so its all good Im gonna have to steal it from him to try some of my new Doom 3 tweaks I just put in to make the game more enjoyable and such my object dock is getting bigger by the minute.. I just finished downloading and installing Nero 6 Pro and just really waiting for some anime to download so I can watch them and give my opinion (on here of course) and also if I want to buy it.. when they come out that is of course... Popotan is going to be very interesting because of all of the Fan Service.. and Midori No Hibi Days 4 is going to be funny... just like the rest of the episodes I've seen so far (which includes 1, 2, and 3) so I know it is going to take forever.. but I can wait.. hopefully not forever.. but a long time.. Shareaza is so much better then Morpheus and Kazaa Lite K++ because it searches more networks and has no spyware.. runs faster.. looks better.. and is more reliable... the only problem is people queing you for the downloads you want.. I dont see what the big problem is in letting everyone in at the same time.. except bandwidth... I guess theyre trying to maximize download speeds for everyone... so I can wait... hehe yeah.. I think I can type to goddamn fast... my hands are like flying all around this keyboard.. which just started to happen recently.. I think its because I've been typing a lot more lately... hehe my dad once asked if I was really typing or just putting up jibberish hehe he was all surprised to hear I was actually typing instead of doing what he thought... hehe yeah so.. I think I might play some Marvel Vs. Capcom 2 because Ive got nothing better to do.. and Im not going to disrupt Shareaza's downloads because then I'll have to wait at the end of the line again.. and.. my RAM is close to full anyway so a game would pretty much kill it... except Thief Deadly Shadows which barely takes up any RAM... it takes up like 4 megs in game... heheh I might play that after Marvel Vs. Capcom 2... yeah so I had better stop typing now because I'll soon start explaining what I think I'm gonna do for the next like 5 weeks which would be like a whole new page on my Blog.. so yeah.. I think I'll stop now... Toodles

mhmm so this is the portal of hell just in case you havent ever seen it before.. hehe I saw it long enough to pull out my camera and snap a shot of it.. lol yeah well have fun lookin at it urlLink urlLink

yeahhh so Here's the shirt I want from megatokyo.. this is what is on the front anyway... Id like to have one before the LAN party.. maybe.. itd be cool to have something like That at the LAN party lol yeah so.. the next one is Doom 3 urlLink urlLink

Oh yeah. Took me one day to get from crap to polished computing.. hehe Im back up and running baby! got everything back up.. even better than before... Im using a bit more RAM than I'd hope to.. buuut its desktop computing and not gaming so it doesnt matter. Also Ive got Trillian back and as well as Shareaza back up and downloading stuff I shouldnt hehehehe yeah aaand im monitoring ATi's stock on my ObjectDock so.. it's all good I feel like I wanna play a game.. but then again I dont.. so.. lol Im a tad confused.. also.. its been way to damn long since there has been a pic on here.. so I think im gonna post a Doom 3 pic.. or another little something from Megatokyo.. or both.. yeah so watch out

DAMN! My boot.ini is screwed up on my normal computer so I can log back into it until later today... which sucks majorly... but its not that bad if I think about it... hey.. I might get more sleep tonight.. lol. I'm on my mom's computer right now.. in my room of course because it is a laptop.. though painfully slow compared to my computer.. it still does what it has to do to work.. and I can still access Blogger! and Megatokyo of course lol. Buuut I cant post any pics from the computer... and thank god for Mike Deonorain.. he has boot disks of Windows XP so I can repair my installation.. hehe yes he's going to leave it for me before he leaves so I dont have to wait long before I get it... I might take my brother's bike over there just for the sake of time.. but.. I might hurt the disc if it is in my pocket... unless it is in a case.. which it miiight be.. well anyway.. a couple other reasons its bad for me to be off my normal computer is that I dont have all my social programs, no music(except my minidisc), no Porn (shhhhhh), no normal pics, No "my computer lifestyle" environment, no games, aaand of course my computers monster speed.. mhmm well.. I think ive rant'ed enough for now.. I might post another before I leave for bed.. so watch out! hehe

mhmm here i am at 3:15 am we got a new puppy.. adding another dog to the household lol its a Pug/Jackrussel mix.. adding to our other dog..who is a purebred Pug the new dogs name is Annie.. and our purebred Pug is named Frankie.. if I had a Digital Camera I could take a picture.. buuut I dont.. so.. yeah... hehe the little puppy is so wiry and energetic hehe and has really sharp teeth. Weelll anyway.. Ive edited Doom 3 and other things on my computer to make the game run faster.. hehe and it does.. I can run it at 1280x1024 on High Detail hehe which is really good for a last generation High End video Card. My brother runs it at 800x600 on Medium Detail which is good.. I guess.. for a last Generation Mid-Range video card.. which is a Radeon 9600XT and mine is a Radeon 9800 Pro.. with a Modded heatsink from Zalman. my case is open.. but that is only to improve cooling inside the case.. with my AMD Athlon 64 3200+, Asus K8V Deluxe, 512mb PC 2100 DDR, Radeon 9800 Pro, 3DFX Voodoo 3 2000 Sec, 100GB WD1000 HD, and a 450 Watt Pow. Supply... lol.. I just went on a computer Rant.. im sorry.. it was bound to happen.. hehe.. well.. I'm on my way to beating Doom 3 again... about.. 1/4 the way through.. and well.. in other news.. my g/f.. is.. *sigh* madly in love with me.. hehe which is good. Ahh well.. I might see her on Monday.. she's gonna wake me up this morning on the phone... so... I kinda have to go to bed before 5AM lol

hehe sitting here listening to Things I'll Never Say... thinking about the girl that said she is "totally in love with me" hehe feels good to know you can make someone feel like that... hopefully I can see her again within the next week... which im pretty sure I will oo I cant wait..

yup so I saw her today... hehe.. and she says I make her a little week in the knees when Im around her.. :) I know ive been neglecting pics up here as late... I'll have to find something to post up here next time.. which will be very soon... so.. yeah.. hehe seeya

Yes yes... I now have someone... and that's all I'm gonna say.. nothing more.. lol aaand my brother is in here as usual.. playing another damn game of Halo... ahhh will there ever be some peace? lol well that's about it..

yes yes I took down a post.. just because it made me a tad uncomfortable its up there... lol.. It even surprises me my pic is still up.. but anyway.. i think im gonna get some sleep now.. buuut Im GOING to wake up earlier than usual today... Im going to set jetAudio to wake me up... so.. anyway... seeya later people...Oo quick update.. my fav Avril song is Things I'll Never Say.... lol I guess because Id like someone to sayy that to me... see.. during songs I take place as if im the guy they are singing about.. or if the guy is singing.. I think of myself as him... it makes it better... and another quick update... lol Im gonna go search for that Why song Amber Marie recommended... lol quick arent i?

ahhh and reguarding that question... I think..... I like.. The First album a little bit more than the other one... and yes I do like Nobody's Home even though I am the kind of guy who likes the "happy" songs more... but... lol it doesnt seem to matter with Avril

ahhh yes... I already listened to both albums and my fav songs are Sk8er Boi, Things I'll Never Say, Nobody's Fool, Happy Ending, Fall To Pieces, Slipped Away, and Take Me Away... OK so.. i have a lot of favorite songs that she has... she's the second highest rated artist in my iTunes Library... only second to John Mayer mhmm Im listening to Things I'll Never Say right now.. hehe I just cant seem to get enough right now...

Hehe you know... Its odd sometimes how long it'll take me to catch onto something good... I just got home and now I started listening to Avril Lavigne now.. hehe I like it... and she's kinda cute to.. so.. lol already have all three of her albums including her Live Acoustic album which is good too.. I have my computer turned the way it should.. and it feels more natural and less cluttered like this.. and it makes my computer seem more streamlined. Its always fun to have something new that you like isnt it?

mhmm so Im still over my dad's and my brother is currently laying down attempting to go to sleep... aaand Im still logging on me dad's computer.... caant wait to see what kind of information hehe and I successfully set up two monitors with no more problems like earlier.. hehe aaand well lol hmmm I got nothin else to say soo toodles
